item.title: Kanto
item.description: Kanto is a beautiful female we picked up from Living Art by Frank Payne this year because her sire, Brightflame, is a great match for Alfred. All we know is that Brightflame came from a Canvas pairing and that some of the last pairings done were Bolt x Marley and Marley x Outline.

item.title: Lineage: Living Art by Frank Payne
item.description: Living Art by Frank Payne Brightflame Unknown Brightflame Brightflame1 Sire Canvas Sire (possibly Bolt/Marley) Dam Canvas Dam (possibly Marley or Outline’s daughter) Minors Sires M1, M3, M6, M20 Dams F3, F5, F8, F20
